text:
Change the font size in this file to something smaller
I apologize, but I don't have access to any specific file or document that you're referring to. As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to directly manipulate or change files on your device or in your environment. 

If you're working with a document or file on your computer and want to change the font size, you'll need to do that within the application you're using to view or edit the file. The exact steps will depend on what type of file it is and what software you're using.

For example:

1. In Microsoft Word: Select the text, then go to the Home tab and change the font size in the Font group.

2. In Google Docs: Select the text, then use the font size dropdown in the toolbar.

3. In most web browsers: You can usually change the font size of a webpage by using Ctrl + (plus) to increase or Ctrl - (minus) to decrease the size.

4. In many text editors: Look for a "Font" or "Format" menu option where you can adjust the font size.

If you need specific instructions for a particular application or file type, please provide more details and I'd be happy to assist further.
now change the font in this file
summary: Request to change font size in unspecified file
